data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Ondo, Nigeria need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ondo, Nigeria
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Ondo, Nigeria.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Ondo, Nigeria to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 2,977,967 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Ondo to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Warji people.
Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Ondo, Nigeria so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Ondo, Nigeria know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ondo, Nigeria has a population of 4,011,400.

We estimate Ondo has 1,033,433 people who might know Jesus, 1,020,797 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,957,170 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Ondo, Nigeria to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

location.name: Ondo
